name: Emoji Games: Match 3
description:
Swap the emojis to match 3 or more in a row.

You have to compose the big emoji by ejecting the special pieces from the bottom of the board, to complete each level.

You win a bomb by matching 5 in a row. Swap it with an emoji to destroy that particular emoji on the board.

Features:

- Free
- 1000 levels
- You can skip any level any time
- Different difficulties and boards
- Clean interface
- Designed for tablets and phones


Emoji icons supplied by EmojiOne: https://www.emojione.com/
